text_block_list.text: The summer training camp. Manhattan Cafe had been training harder than I'd ever seen before.

text_block_list.name: Manhattan Cafe
text_block_list.text: Haa… haa…

text_block_list.name: Manhattan Cafe
text_block_list.text: Huuh…
choice_data_list: Okay, good work. Let's leave it there for today.

text_block_list.name: Manhattan Cafe
text_block_list.text: But… trainer-san…
choice_data_list: I said, let's leave it there.
I said, let's leave it there.

text_block_list.name: Manhattan Cafe
text_block_list.text: Under… stood…… Thank you. Um… trainer-san…

text_block_list.name: Manhattan Cafe
text_block_list.text: Do you think all this training… has made me stronger…?

text_block_list.name: Manhattan Cafe
text_block_list.text: Really… In that case, trainer-san, there's something I'd like you to do for me.

text_block_list.name: Manhattan Cafe
text_block_list.text: Something… very important.
Manhattan Cafe had asked me to come and watch her race down on the beach that night. But who with? She was alone when I got to our meeting place…

text_block_list.name: Manhattan Cafe
text_block_list.text: Thank you for coming, trainer-san.

text_block_list.name: Manhattan Cafe
text_block_list.text: It's very important that you see this.
choice_data_list: Are you going to race your… friend…?

text_block_list.name: Manhattan Cafe
text_block_list.text: No… not her. The truth is…

text_block_list.name: Manhattan Cafe
text_block_list.text: "They" are here… Now… behind you, trainer-san.

text_block_list.name: Manhattan Cafe
text_block_list.text: Don't… turn around. They… want you.

text_block_list.name: Manhattan Cafe
text_block_list.text: As long as you're with me, you are safe. But they will try to draw you away… get you on your own…
choice_data_list: W… what will they do then…?
W… what will they do then…?

text_block_list.name: Manhattan Cafe
text_block_list.text: I don't know. But…

text_block_list.name: Manhattan Cafe
text_block_list.text: I will not let them take you.

text_block_list.name: Manhattan Cafe
text_block_list.text: Tonight, we are going to race. And put an end to this.

text_block_list.name: Manhattan Cafe
text_block_list.text: Trainer-san… do you believe me…?
I swallowed hard. I didn't want to think about what might happen if she lost. But there was only one answer to her question…

text_block_list.name: Manhattan Cafe
text_block_list.text: Thank you. Alright. Shall we…?

text_block_list.name: Manhattan Cafe
text_block_list.text: The rules are simple. Run to the rock over there, and then back again. The first one back is the winner.

text_block_list.name: Manhattan Cafe
text_block_list.text: They are strong. But…

text_block_list.name: Manhattan Cafe
text_block_list.text: I will not lose. I am stronger now. Stronger than ever. Because of the work we did, together, trainer-san.

text_block_list.name: Manhattan Cafe
text_block_list.text: I am ready. Would you…?
I nodded, and took a step back. I raised an arm, ready to signal the start.

text_block_list.name: Manhattan Cafe
text_block_list.text: Huu―
A sharp breath, and she took flight. The jet black of her hair mingled with the dark of the night as she faded into the shadows like an apparition.
I could only see one figure receding into the distance. But when I squinted, I could swear I saw a second set of footprints in the sand…
From the way the sand flew from their feet, it looked like Manhattan Cafe was ahead, but only barely. The effort was written on her face as she dug deep to hold her slender lead…

text_block_list.name: Manhattan Cafe
text_block_list.text: (You really are fast… That's it, isn't it…? You wanted to run… like this…)

text_block_list.name: Manhattan Cafe
text_block_list.text: (To get faster… to get better… But you couldn't tell anyone… Because no one else can see you…)

text_block_list.name: Manhattan Cafe
text_block_list.text: (That's why… you wanted trainer-san…!)

text_block_list.name: Manhattan Cafe
text_block_list.text: (Because even if he doesn't see …he can still believe…!)

text_block_list.name: Manhattan Cafe
text_block_list.text: You… cannot see her… No matter how hard you look… you do not have eyes to see… Neither you… nor anyone else…

text_block_list.name: Manhattan Cafe
text_block_list.text: No one knows she is there. No one but me. Because… she is far, far away…

text_block_list.name: Manhattan Cafe
text_block_list.text: You… cannot see her… And yet… it's almost as if you can…?

text_block_list.name: Manhattan Cafe
text_block_list.text: (You wanted to be noticed… You wanted him to see you… but…)
From out of nowhere, a blast of wind… sand blew all around… they were close to finish line now, but I couldn't see a thing…

text_block_list.name: Manhattan Cafe
text_block_list.text: I won't let you… I won't let you take him…!

text_block_list.name: Manhattan Cafe
text_block_list.text: Haaaah!
As suddenly as it had started, the wind dropped. The sand settled, and the air was still.

text_block_list.name: Manhattan Cafe
text_block_list.text: They… no, she… has gone. I think… she was able to do what she needed to do…

text_block_list.name: Manhattan Cafe
text_block_list.text: All she wanted… was to run. Like everybody else.

text_block_list.name: Manhattan Cafe
text_block_list.text: Like all of us at the academy. To win. To lose. To get faster. To get stronger. That was all she wanted.

text_block_list.name: Manhattan Cafe
text_block_list.text: But… no one even knew she was there…

text_block_list.name: Manhattan Cafe
text_block_list.text: If only I could have found her sooner… You might not have been dragged into this.

text_block_list.name: Manhattan Cafe
text_block_list.text: I… think she is.
choice_data_list: And it was thanks to you.
And it was thanks to you.

text_block_list.name: Manhattan Cafe
text_block_list.text: Trainer-san… you are… a very unusual person.

text_block_list.name: Manhattan Cafe
text_block_list.text: You must have been so afraid and yet… … you put it aside as if it didn't matter at all.

text_block_list.name: Manhattan Cafe
text_block_list.text: (Someone like that… is what she needed… what I…)

text_block_list.name: Manhattan Cafe
text_block_list.text: Ah…

text_block_list.name: Manhattan Cafe
text_block_list.text: A shooting star… It's almost as though… she's… running…

text_block_list.name: Manhattan Cafe
text_block_list.text: Um… trainer-san… Can we… stay here a while longer…?
Manhattan Cafe didn't say another word, and we gazed at the night sky together for I don't know how long. And I knew… this was a training camp I would never forget.
